segments.text: Mom , I've got something to tell you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Aunt Jane buys a new bike for Tom . He is putting on grand airs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I bought you a new one last year . Isn't it handsome ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is great . But Tom's bike is so much better than mine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Frankly , he is more well-behaved than you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why hasn't the bus come yet ? Every morning we have to wait for so long .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mom , it's OK . I will buy a big car one day . It is faster than the bus .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? I am looking forward to that . What about the traffic ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see.Yes . I will buy a plane for you . There is no traffic up there .
segments.speaker: S1
